info.summary: A generic task runner allowing to create teardown a remote agent worker and run tasks on it
Install opereto python virtual environment library
Remove opereto python virtual environment library
A generic listener collecting test data and logs from test tools
A generic test record used by the Opereto test listener to store test data
A default service container used by the cycle mechanism to wrap cycle services
A simple parent process used by the local command of Opereto CLI to correlate local dev processes with Opereto

name: Opereto Worker Libs
summary: This package adds and removes opereto official python virtualenv worker and performs basic operations related to it
description: This is Opereto official python worker. It is a python virtualenv based allowing isolation of the worker libs and dependencies from other python packages that may be installed on the worker host or container. Opereto provides a set of out-of-the-box services depending on this worker library. Worker libs can be installed on standard host OS and on custom tool containers. Opereto standard worker stateful set is based on opereto/worker standard container (see the Dockerfile included in this package to learn more).
